sentences.text: ANNEX A
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate and Social Responsibility
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Health, environmental, safety, security
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards of Directors of Carnival Corporation & plc established Board-level Health, Environmental, Safety & Security (HESS) Committees comprised of four independent Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The principal function of the HESS Committees is to assist the Boards in fulfilling their responsibility to supervise and monitor Carnival Corporation & plcs health, environmental, safety, security and sustainability-related policies, programs, initiatives at sea and ashore, and compliance with related legal and regulatory requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The HESS Committees and our management team review all significant risks or exposures and associated mitigating actions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Chief Executive Officers of our brands attends the meetings of the HESS Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival Corporation & plc recognizes its responsibility to provide industry leadership and to conduct our business as a responsible global citizen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate leadership is manifested in our Code of Business Conduct and Ethics, which requires that every employee and member of the Boards use sound judgment, maintain high ethical standards and demonstrate honesty in all business dealings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a responsible global citizen, Carnival Corporation & plc is committed to achieving and maintaining the highest standards of professional and ethical conduct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Carnival Corporation & plcs HESS policy describes our commitments to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Protecting the health, safety and security of our passengers, guests, employees and all others working on behalf of Carnival Corporation & plc, thereby promoting an organization that is free of injuries, illness and loss;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Protecting the environment, including the marine environment in which our vessels sail and the communities in which we operate, minimizing adverse environmental consequences and using resources efficiently and sustainably;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fully complying with or exceeding all legal and statutory requirements related to health, environment, safety, security and sustainability throughout our business activities; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assigning health, environment, safety, security and sustainability matters the same priority as other critical business matter
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The HESS Policy is published on the Carnival Corporation & plc website at www.carnivalcorp.com or www.carnivalplc.com
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards recognize that Carnival Corporation & plc needs to ensure that there is a consistent standard of operation throughout its fleet in keeping with its leading position in the cruise industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this regard, the Carnival Corporation & plc Maritime Policy & Analysis Department is headed by a Chief Maritime Officer, with a full-time professional and administrative staff, and is responsible for providing a common, integrated approach to management of HESS matters and for reporting to the HESS Committees on such matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chief Maritime Officer reports to the Chief Executive Officer and to the Chairman of the HESS Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The principal activities of the Maritime Policy & Analysis Department include establishing HESS Policy, standards and procedures, and measuring and reporting on HESS-related performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Carnival Corporation & plc Risk Advisory & Assurance Services (RAAS) Department is headed by the Chief Audit Officer, who reports directly to the Chairs of the Audit and HESS Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chief Audit Officer also has a dotted reporting line to the General Counsel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The RAAS Department conducts annual HESS audits of each brands head office and of each ship in our fleet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These audits are in addition to the audits performed by external third-party certification and regulatory auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival plc Directors Report       A-5
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ANNEX A
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each RAAS Department HESS audit is organized and planned to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Verify compliance with applicable rules, corporate standards, brand policies and procedures, regulations, codes, and guidance directly involved in the safe conduct of ship operations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Verify the effectiveness and efficiency of the shipboard and shore-side HESS management systems; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Identify opportunities for continuous improvement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival Corporation & plc has long been committed to operating responsibly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that sustainability is about preserving our environment, respecting our employees and the communities where we do business and returning value to our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We voluntarily publish Sustainability Reports that address governance, stakeholder engagement, environmental, labor, human rights, society, product responsibility, economic and other sustainability-related issues and performance indicators.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These reports, which can be viewed at www.carnivalcorp.com and www.carnivalplc.com, are developed in accordance with the Sustainability Reporting Guidelines established by the Global Reporting Initiative, the global standard for reporting on environmental, social and governance policies, practices and performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of our sustainability strategy, we have voluntarily reported our carbon footprint via the CDP (formerly, the Carbon Disclosure Project) each year since 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CDP rates companies on the depth and scope of their disclosures and the quality of their reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have developed a greenhouse gas inventory management plan in 2010 in accordance with the requirements of International Organization for Standardization (ISO) 14064-1:2006 standard and The Greenhouse Gas Protocol.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our submission included details of our most recently compiled emissions data and reduction efforts, along with our completion of an independent, third-party verification of our greenhouse gas emissions inventory.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also disclose our water stewardship through the CDP water program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our brands environmental management systems are certified in accordance with ISO 14001 standard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ISO, an international standard- setting body, produces worldwide industrial and commercial standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ISO 14001 standard, the environmental management standard that was developed to help organizations manage the environmental impacts of their processes, products and services, presents a structured approach to setting environmental objectives and targets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It provides a framework for any organization to apply these broad conceptual tools to their own processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are committed to reducing our air emissions and improving air quality by evaluating new and established technology solutions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Liquefied natural gas is one of the solutions we are working to implement across our fleet both in port and at sea due to its reduced carbon profile and cleaner emissions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue our partnership with The Nature Conservancy, one of the worlds leading conservation organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are leveraging our partnership in their efforts to restore coral reefs, protect marine ecosystems and promote natural systems to help reduce the impact of storms and rising sea levels in coastal communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A-6         Carnival plc Directors Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ANNEX A
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have developed a set of 2020 sustainability goals reinforcing our commitment to the environment, our guests, our employees and the communities in which we operate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our ten goals listed below are aimed at reducing our environmental footprint while enhancing the health, safety and security of our guests and crew members, and ensuring sustainable business practices across our brands and business partners:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Environmental Goals          Reduce intensity of carbon dioxide equivalent (CO e) emissions from operations by 25% by 2020 relative to our 2005 baseline       Continue to improve the quality of our emissions into the air by developing, deploying and operating exhaust gas cleaning systems across our fleet       Increase usage of ship-to-shore power connection capabilities       Increase Advanced Wastewater Purification Systems coverage of our fleet capacity by 10 percentage points by 2020 relative to our 2014 baseline       Continue to improve our shipboard operations water use efficiency by 5% by 2020 relative to our 2010 baseline       Continue to reduce waste generated by our shipboard operations by 5% by 2020 relative to our 2010 baseline   Health, Safety and Security Goal          Continue to build on our commitment to protect the health, safety and security of guests, employees and all others working on our behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sustainable Workforce and Community Goals       Continue to build a diverse and inclusive workforce and provide all employees with a positive work environment and opportunities to build a rewarding career to further drive employee engagement       Further develop and implement vendor assurance procedures ensuring compliance with Carnival Corporation & plcs Business Partner Code of Conduct and Ethics       Continue to work on initiatives and partnerships that support and sponsor a broad range of organizations for the benefit of the communities where we operate 2

sentences.text: Statement of Directors Responsibilities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Directors are responsible for preparing the Annual Report, the Carnival plc Directors Remuneration Report and the financial statements in accordance with applicable law and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company law requires the Directors to prepare financial statements for each financial year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under that law the Directors have prepared the group and parent company financial statements in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards as adopted by the EU (IFRS).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under company law, the Directors must not approve the financial statements unless they are satisfied that they give a true and fair view of the state of affairs of Carnival plc and the Carnival plc group and of the Statements of Income of the Carnival plc group for that period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In preparing the financial statements the Directors are required to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: select suitable accounting policies and then apply them consistently
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: make judgments and estimates that are reasonable and prudent;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: state whether applicable IFRSs have been followed, subject to any material departures disclosed and explained in the financial statements; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: prepare the group and parent company financial statements on the going concern basis unless it is inappropriate to presume that the company will continue in business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Directors are responsible for keeping adequate accounting records that are sufficient to show and explain Carnival plcs transactions and disclose with reasonable accuracy at any time the financial position of Carnival plc and the Carnival plc group and to enable them to ensure that he financial statements and the Carnival plc Directors Remuneration Report comply with the Companies Act 2006 and, as regards the Carnival plc consolidated IFRS financial statements, Article 4 of the IAS Regulation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They are also responsible for safeguarding the assets of Carnival plc and the Carnival plc group and hence for taking reasonable steps for the prevention and detection of fraud and other irregularities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Directors, whose names and functions are listed in the Proxy Statement, confirms that, to the best of his or her knowledg
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Carnival plc group financial statements, which have been prepared in accordance with IFRSs give a true and fair view of the assets, liabilities, financial position and net income of the Carnival plc group;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain information required to be included in the Carnival plc Directors Remuneration Report is set forth in Part I (which is also known as the Compensation Discussion and Analysis) and in the Executive Compensation section of the Notice of Annual Meetings and Proxy Statement to which this Report is annexed (the Proxy Statement).

sentences.text: As explained in Part I, Parts I and II of this report form part of the Annual Report of Carnival plc for the year ended November 30, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival plc and Carnival Corporation are separate legal entities (together referred to in this Report as Carnival Corporation & plc) and each company has its own Board of Directors and Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, as required by the agreements governing the dual listed company (DLC) arrangement, there is a single management team and the Boards of Directors and members of the Committees of the Boards are identical.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, consistent with prior years, we have included remuneration paid by Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc in the Carnival plc Directors Remuneration Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both Parts I and II of this Report are in compliance with Schedule 8 of the Large and Medium-Sized Companies and Groups (Accounts and Reports) Regulations 2008, as amended (the LMCG Regulations) and the UK Corporate Governance Code, the UK Companies Act 2006 and the Listing Rules of the UK Listing Authority.

sentences.text: Details of the Compensation Committees process for making compensation determinations, including the advice provided by internal colleagues and external advisors are set out in Part I. As stated in Part I, Frederic W. Cook & Co., Inc. (together with its UK affiliated firm, FIT Remuneration Consultants LLP, which is a member of the Remuneration Consultants Group, the UK professional body, and complies with its code of conduct) were appointed by the Compensation Committees as their external advisors.

sentences.text: Element   Purpose and Link to Strategy   Operation   Maximum   Performance Conditions   Changes to the  Policy Context of Policy   As a U.S. headquartered business with most senior executives based in the U.S., the Compensation Committees overall approach to total compensation is to set pay by reference to U.S. market practice.

sentences.text: Similarly, the design of bonus and long-term incentives is largely driven from a U.S. context.

sentences.text: Salaries are reviewed after results for the prior fiscal year are available.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Salaries may be increased if merited by performance or other market factors in order to attract or retain our executives.

sentences.text: Each year a competitive market review is undertaken to assist the Compensation Committees in their assessments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This assessment is undertaken against companies that the Compensation Committees consider to be appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This data is used to inform considerations rather than to benchmark to any particular peer group level and the Compensation Committees apply appropriate judgment in consideration of the data.

sentences.text: Element   Purpose and link to strategy   Operation   Maximum   Performance Conditions   Changes to the  Policy Long-Term Incentive Compensation  To recognize scope of responsibilities  To reward demonstrated performance and leadership  To motivate future superior performance  To align the interests of the executive with our shareholders long- term interests  To encourage the retention Each of Carnival Corporation & plc has adopted broad omnibus plans - the Carnival Corporation 2011 Stock Plan and the Carnival plc 2014 Employee Share Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of these plans permit equity grants to be made in a wide variety of forms including market value options, stock-appreciation rights (SARs) and restricted stock or restricted stock unit grants and cash based awards, each of which may or may not be subject to vesting performance measures as the Compensation Committees consider appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committees reserve the right to use all aspects of the plans as approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Current practice (but without limiting the powers within the rules) is to no longer operate pure time-based share (TBS) grants and to operate a program under which a combination of three forms of grants are made each year:    Management Incentive Plan-Tied Equity (MTE) Grants (commencing with the first grant in April 2017)         typically made at the beginning of each fiscal year         grant value is determined based upon annual MIP results which can have value of nil to 200% of the target grant value (the grant level will not be more generous than mirroring those of the MIP scale with 50% at threshold, 100% at target and 200% at maximum) The Carnival Corporation 2011 Stock Plan and Carnival plc 2014 Employee Share Plan rules have individual maximum on equity grants of 1,000,000 shares delivered per year and on cash awards of $10,000,000 paid per year, or 3,000,000 shares made over 36 months where grants are made as share options or SARs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committees expressly reserve discretion to make such grants as they consider appropriate within these limits.

sentences.text: 5. Consideration of employment conditions elsewhere in the group
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining the compensation policy and the compensation payable to the Executive Directors, the Compensation Committees took the pay and employment conditions of employees of the Carnival Corporation & plc group (Carnival group) into account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Carnival groups pay policy ensures a clear and direct link between the performance of the Carnival group or relevant operating company and compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Substantial use of performance-based compensation not only ensures the continued alignment of the interests of shareholders and senior executives within the Carnival group, but also enables the Carnival group to attract, retain and motivate the talented people upon whom our success depends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival Corporation & plc is committed to encouraging strong performance through a reward system that aligns managements interests with those of its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Across the workforce more broadly, many employees participate in bonus and commission plans based on the performance of their employing company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where locally competitive, employees are also provided savings plans such as 401(k) plans, company-sponsored pension plans, life insurance plans and a range of other employment benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to these elements, the Carnival Corporation & plc also issues share-based compensation to management to incentivize, retain and recruit talent which encourages an ownership culture among employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company does not operate any compensation or incentive plans in which only Executive Directors participate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CARNIVAL PLC CORPORATE GOVERNANCE REPORT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc (together referred to as Carnival Corporation & plc) operate under a dual listed company arrangement with primary listings in the U.S. and the UK.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, Carnival Corporation & plc has implemented a single corporate governance framework consistent, to the extent possible, with the governance practices and requirements of both countries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where there are customs or practices that differ between the two countries, Carnival Corporation & plc has nonetheless sought to be compliant with UK best practices whenever possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival Corporation & plc believes that its resulting corporate governance framework effectively addresses the corporate governance requirements of both the U.S. and the UK.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival Corporation & plc has adopted corporate governance guidelines (the Guidelines) that set forth the general governance principles approved by the Boards of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These principles are available on Carnival Corporation & plcs website and are summarized as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the members of each of the Boards must be independent in accordance with the corporate governance rules applicable to companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange and the London Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards will each have at all times an Audit Committee, a Compensation Committee, a Health, Environmental, Safety & Security
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards will each have at all times an Audit Committee, a Compensation Committee, a Health, Environmental, Safety & Security (HESS) Committee and a Nominating & Governance Committee (collectively, the Committees).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All the members of the Committees will be independent Directors under the criteria applicable to companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange, the London Stock Exchange and any other applicable regulatory requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Committee has its own written charter, which principally sets forth the purposes, goals and responsibilities of the Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating & Governance Committees will review with the Boards, on an annual basis, the requisite skills and characteristics of new
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Non-Executive Directors shall appoint a Senior Independent Director to preside at meetings of the Non-Executive Directors and at Board meetings in the absence of the Chairman, and to serve as the principal liaison for Non-Executive Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors have free and full access to officers and employees of Carnival Corporation & plc, to the advice and services of the Company Secretary to the Boards and to independent professional advice at the expense of Carnival Corporation & plc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committees will recommend the form and amount of Director and senior executive compensation in accordance with the policies and principles set forth in its charter and conduct an annual review thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, the Compensation Committees will annually review the compensation of the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) and his performance to enable the CEO to provide strong leadership for Carnival Corporation & plc in the short and long-term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival plc Corporate Governance Report     C-1
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ANNEX C
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards and the Nominating & Governance Committees are responsible for CEO and board succession planning
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating & Governance Committees will maintain orientation programs for new Directors and continuing education programs for all Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards will conduct an annual performance evaluation to determine whether they, their Committees and individual Directors are functioning effectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Non-Executive Directors will meet at least annually under the direction of the Senior Independent Director to conduct an appraisal of the Chairmans performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shareholders may communicate with the Boards by addressing all communications to the Company Secretary, who must forward any item requiring immediate attention to the Senior Independent Director, who must in turn notify the Boards of any matters for discussion or action as appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival Corporation & plc monitors governance developments in the U.S. and the UK to support a vigorous and effective corporate governance framework.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Set out below is a statement of how Carnival Corporation & plc has applied the main principles of the UK Corporate Governance Code (formerly known as the Combined Code) published by the UK Financial Reporting Council in September 2014 (the Corporate Governance Code) during the year ended November 30, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the Corporate Governance Code is available on the website of the UK Financial Reporting Council at www.frc.org.uk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The requirements of rule 7.2.6R of the UK Listing Authoritys Disclosure Guidance and Transparency Rules sourcebook can be found in the Carnival plc Directors Report in Annex A of the Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Composition
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Boards of Directors is currently comprised of ten members, of which two are Executive Directors and eight are Non-Executive Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except for Helen Deeble, who was appointed to the Boards in July 2016, each member of the Boards has served for the full year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Directors are required to submit themselves for annual re-election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The biographical details of the members of the Boards standing for election or re-election and their qualifications to serve as Board and Committee members are contained in the Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Directors elected in 2016 have been subject to a formal performance evaluation during the year, as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the date of this report, 30% of the members of the Boards are women (being three of ten members).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Balance and Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the Boards annual independence assessment, each Director was required to complete an independence questionnaire.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All questionnaires were reviewed and assessed by the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following this review, all of the eight nominees for election or re-election as Non- Executive Directors are considered by the Boards to be independent in accordance with the corporate governance rules of the New York Stock Exchange and the London Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Richard J. Glasier, Sir John Parker, Stuart Subotnick and Laura Weil have been Non-Executive Directors for more than nine years from the date of their first election to the Boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, notwithstanding this fact, the Boards have determined that each of those Directors is independent for the reasons set forth below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with U.S. practice, the Boards believe that length of tenure should be only one of the factors considered with respect to the independence of Directors and, accordingly, that tenure alone should not result in the loss of independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards believe that automatic loss of independence status for Directors due to tenure would effectively operate as a term limit for independent Directors and result in the loss of the valuable contributions of Directors who have been able to develop, over time,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival Corporation & plc maintains insurance to indemnify the Directors when it is unable to do so due to insolvency or as a result of a derivative suit.

sentences.text: Board Procedures and Responsibilities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meetings of the Boards are held on a regular basis to enable the Boards to properly discharge their responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the year ended November 30, 2016, the Board of Directors of Carnival plc held a total of seven meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Board meetings during the year were attended by the full Board except Ms. Deeble, who attended the one meeting held following her appointment to the Boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Non-Executive Directors meet periodically during the year with the Chairman of the Boards with no other Executive Directors present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agenda for each Board meeting and meeting schedules are prepared by the Chairman and reviewed and approved by Stuart Subotnick, the Senior Independent Director, to enable the flow of relevant information to the Boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Board member is entitled to suggest the inclusion of items on the agenda and to raise at any Board meetings subjects that are not on the agenda for that meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-Executive Directors are required to allocate sufficient time to meet the expectations of their role.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The consent of the Chairman and the Senior Independent Director must be sought before accepting additional directorships that might affect the time a Non-Executive Director of Carnival Corporation & plc is able to devote to that role.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards have resolved that Executive Directors may not serve as a Non-Executive Board member on more than one FTSE 100 or Fortune 100 company nor as the Chairperson of such a company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: supervise and monitor Carnival Corporation & plcs health, environmental, safety, security and sustainability policies, programs, initiatives at sea and ashore, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: comply with legal and regulatory requirements relating to health, environmental, safety, security and sustainability.

sentences.text: Significant Accounting Judgments
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The significant areas considered by the Carnival plc Audit Committee and discussed with the Carnival plc external auditors, PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC), for fiscal 2016 were as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Impairment Reviews of AIDA Cruises (AIDA), Costa Cruises (Costa) and Cunard Goodwill: The Audit Committee considered whether the carrying value of AIDAs, Costas and Cunards goodwill held by Carnival plc should be impaired.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The judgment in relation to the impairment assessments largely relates to the assumptions underlying the calculation of the fair value less the cost of selling (market participant) model.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee evaluated the key assumptions, including assessing sensitivities, related to net revenue yields; net cruise costs, including fuel prices; capacity changes; weighted-average cost of capital and long-term growth rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee performed this evaluation using reports received from management, including the Board approved strategic plan, outlining the basis for assumptions used.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee determined that these key assumptions were reasonable and that AIDAs, Costas and Cunards goodwill was not impaired as of July 31, 2016 and that appropriate disclosures have been made in the Carnival plc consolidated IFRS financial statements (see Note 11).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Impairment Reviews of Certain Costa, P&O Cruises (Australia) and P&O Cruises (UK) Ships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee considered whether the carrying value of certain ships within these fleets may be impaired.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The judgment in relation to impairment largely relates to the assumptions underlying the calculation of the value in use of the ship being tested for impairment, primarily whether the strategic plan for these ships is achievable and the overall macroeconomic assumptions that underpin the valuation process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee evaluated the key assumptions, including assessing sensitivities, related to net revenue yields, net cruise costs, including fuel prices, life of these ships, estimated sale values, probability of sale occurring and recoverability of proceeds and discount rate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee addressed these matters using reports received from management outlining the basis for assumptions used.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: External Auditors and Audit Tendering
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees have the responsibility for making a recommendation on the appointment, reappointment and removal of the external auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC was recommended by the Audit Committees for reappointment as auditors of Carnival plc at the Annual General Meeting held in April 2016, and reappointment was approved by the shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees also reappointed PwC as Carnival Corporations independent registered certified public accounting firm, as ratified by the shareholders at the April 2016 Annual General Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the policy of the Audit Committees is to undertake a formal assessment of the auditors objectivity and independence each year, which includes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a review of non-audit services provided and related fees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: discussion with the auditors pertaining to a written report detailing all relationships with Carnival Corporation & plc and any other party that could affect the independence or the objectivity of the auditors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: evaluation with the Boards and management of the effectiveness of the external audit process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC has served as Carnival Corporations independent auditor from 1986 to 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2003, following formation of the DLC arrangement between Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc, the independent audits for the consolidated entity, Carnival Corporation & plc, and Carnival plc were endered.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deloitte & Touche LLP, KPMG LLP and PwC participated in these tenders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon completion of this tender process, the Audit Committees decided to recommend to the shareholders that PwC be appointed as the Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc independent auditors for fiscal 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees annually evaluate PwCs performance and have each year recommended that the shareholders vote for the reappointment of PwC as Carnival plcs independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Competition and Market Authoritys (CMA) Statutory Audit Services for Large Companies Market Investigation (Mandatory Use of Competitive Tender Processes and Audit Committee Responsibilities) Order 2014 (the CMA Order) applies to FTSE 350 companies for financial years beginning on or after January 1, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival plc confirms that it complied with the provisions of the CMA Order in fiscal 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The comply- or-explain provision in the Corporate Governance Code on audit tendering continues to apply to Carnival plc for the current year but has been withdrawn in the version of the Corporate Governance Code which applies to fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival plc is also subject to European Union (EU) regulations regarding this matter, which will apply to fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The relevant EU regulation requires statutory auditors to rotate after a period of 20 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This maximum period had been set in the UK, and includes a mandatory competitive tender of audit firms at the 10 year midpoint.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EU regulation and CMA Order also set out transitional rules that determine the latest date for the initial rotation or tender process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC has been Carnival plcs auditor since 2003, so the transitional rules state that they may not be reappointed more than nine years after June 2014, effectively meaning that the audit firm must be changed for the fiscal 2024 audit at the latest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In Carnival plcs case, the CMAs transitional rules have the same effect as the EU regulation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, the Audit Committees currently intend to tender the independent audits for the consolidated entity, Carnival Corporation & plc, and Carnival plc in 2022 for the 2024 audits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our reasons for not putting the audits out for tender until for fiscal 2024 and for recommending that PwC be appointed Carnival plcs auditor for 2017 are as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC is one of the largest independent audit firms in the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, PwC is uniquely qualified because they are the auditors for the three largest public cruise companies in the world, which comprise over 75% of the global cruise industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As such, it has an exceptional leve
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carnival Corporation & plc have periodically undertaken internal surveys to confirm PwCs qualifications and performance, the quality and candor of their communication with the Audit Committees and management and their independence, objectivity and professional skepticism.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results of these surveys have supported the Audit Committees and managements recommendations to appoint PwC as the independent auditors of Carnival Corporation & plc and Carnival plc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: independent auditors of Carnival Corporation & plc and Carnival plc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwCs lead audit engagement partner for Carnival Corporation & plc and its engagement partner for Carnival plc are rotated from the engagement at least every five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The PwC engagement partners working on subsidiaries are rotated from these engagements at least every seven years or in the case of significant EU subsidiaries, for the periods beginning on or after June 17, 2016, the engagement partners will be rotated at least every five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees and management believe the partner rotations support an independent auditor view of our operations and provide fresh insights into the audit processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: are not required under UK or U.S. regulations, further support PwCs independence from management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees Key Policies and Procedures establish a framework to monitor and maintain PwCs independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These Key Policies and Procedures require, among other things, pre-approval from the Audit Committees for audit and permissible non-audit services prior to the performance of any such services in accordance with UK and U.S. regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees only approve services to be provided by PwC that are consistent with these regulations, which helps to support auditor independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: provided by PwC that are consistent with these regulations, which helps to support auditor independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The communication between the Audit Committees and PwC has been timely and informative, which has assisted the Audit Committees in the performance of their oversight responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees and management believe that PwC has performed the audits of Carnival Corporation & plc and Carnival plc with proper professional skepticism and demonstrated the necessary knowledge, experience and skills to meet their audit requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: proper professional skepticism and demonstrated the necessary knowledge, experience and skills to meet their audit requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the review and analysis of audit fees of comparable public companies, the Audit Committees and management believe the PwC audit fees are competitive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees continue to be confident that the effectiveness and independence of the external auditors is not impaired in any way.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no contractual restrictions on the choice of external auditor and, therefore, a resolution proposing the reappointment of PwC as external auditors will be put to the Carnival plc shareholders at the 2017 Annual General Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The fees payable to PwC in respect of the audit and non-audit services provided to Carnival plc during fiscal 2016 were $1.7 million and $0.1 million, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy on Audit Committee pre-approval and permissible non-audit work of the independent auditors, are set out in the Proxy Statement under the heading Independent Registered Certified Public Accounting Firm, which is incorporated by reference into this Corporate Governance Report.

sentences.text: The Company Secretary is required to provide members of the Boards with appropriate information in advance of each meeting and Directors are required to devote adequate preparation time reviewing this information in advance of each meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company Secretary is also responsible for advising the Boards through the Chairman on all corporate governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Directors have access to the advice and services of the Company Secretary and are permitted to obtain independent professional advice, at Carnival Corporation & plcs expense, as he or she may deem necessary to discharge his or her responsibilities as a Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Performance Evaluations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2016, the Nominating & Governance Committees conducted performance evaluations of the Boards, the Boards Committees and the members of our Boards of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance review of Micky Arison, in his role as Chairman, was conducted separately by the Non- Executive Directors, led by the Senior Independent Director, Stuart Subotnick, taking into account the view of the other Executive Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the Boards evaluation exercise, each Director was required to complete a questionnaire about the performance of the Boards and their Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All questionnaires were reviewed and assessed by the Nominating & Governance Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Nominating & Governance Committees reviewed the individual performance of each Director focusing on his or her contribution to Carnival Corporation & plc, and specifically focusing on areas of potential improvement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making their assessment, the Nominating & Governance Committees reviewed considerations of age, diversity, experience and skills in the context of the needs of the Boards, and with the aim of achieving an appropriate balance on the Boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating & Governance Committees also discussed and reviewed with Non-Executive Directors any significant time commitments they have with other companies or organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the number of directorships held by Non-Executive Directors was taken into account, in line with Carnival Corporation & plcs policy on limiting multiple appointments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating & Governance Committees reported the results of the reviews to the Boards, concluding that each Director was an effective member of the Boards and had sufficient time to carry out properly their respective commitments to the Boards, their Committees and all other such duties as were required of them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the view of the Nominating & Governance Committees that the Boards continued to operate effectively during fiscal 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2016, the Nominating & Governance Committees also reviewed their own performance against their respective charters by completing questionnaires that were provided to the Chairman of the Nominating & Governance Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results of such reviews were discussed among the members and reported to the Boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards concluded that the Nominating & Governance Committees continued to function effectively and continued to meet the requirements of their respective charters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Code requires that an externally facilitated evaluation on the Boards effectiveness be undertaken at least once every third year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2016, the Nominating & Governance Committees engaged The Governance Solutions Group, an independent third-party governance expert which has no other connection with Carnival Corporation & plc, to perform an assessment of the effectiveness of the Boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
